fixes.description: The Game class is missing the 'get_symbol_at' method which is called by the PygameRenderer's 'render' method. This method should retrieve the symbol at a given cell on the board.
fixes.instructions: Implement the 'get_symbol_at' method in the Game class. This method should take two parameters, 'row' and 'col', and return the symbol at the specified cell on the board. Use the Board class's 'get_cell' method to access the cell and then return the symbol from the cell.
